text: Emory Andrew Tate II (December 27, 1958 â€“ October 17, 2015) was an American chess player. His son is Emory Andrew Tate III. == Biography == Tate II was born in Chicago to Emory Andrew Tate I, an attorney and soldier of the United States army. == Legacy == The American black grandmaster Maurice Ashley termed Tate "a trailblazer for African-American chess". == Bibliography == * Category:1958 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American chess players
title: Emory Tate
